page.title: 14EDUCATION WICKHAM MKT SCHOOL
page.content: School is divided into different things. Some are lessons, others playtimes. At playtime you can do lots of things like play football or run around. You can also stay in if you want to do some work. There is dinner time when you can have hot dinners cooked in the school kitchens or a packed lunch which you bring from home. The lessons might be language or maths which we do from textbooks or on the board. We also have handwriting and project work where we sometimes watch television and do things like this project. Last but not least we have games where we learn how to play rounders, cricket and football. Sarah likes maths where she learns addition, subtraction, tables and fractions. She is learning to join up her letters in handwriting. In topic work we have learn about Arabs, eskimos and India.
